game.title: The Missing Scepter
game.description: The King's Scepter has been stolen and the kingdom is in chaos. Find the missing scepter and return it to the King.
game.reward: The King's favor, a bag of gold, and the title of "Savior of the Kingdom".

task.description: The Royal Spymaster has been investigating the theft. Talk to him to find out what he knows.
Use the clues from the Royal Spymaster to find the thieves' hideout.

task.objective: Defeat the thieves and retrieve the King's Scepter.
task.description: Battle the thieves and take back the King's Scepter from them.

task.objective: Return the Scepter to the King.
task.description: Return the Scepter to the King and claim your reward.
